transcript: For instance, one time it had been raining several days and this kid came to me and gave me his last pair of dry socks. Put them in my pocket. That's only a little thing but that's the kind of guys I had.

segments.text: For instance, one time it had been raining several days and this kid came to me and gave me his last pair of dry socks.
That's only a little thing but that's the kind of guys I had.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: For instance, one time it'd been raining several days.  And this kid came to me and gave me his last pair of dry socks; put them in my pocket.  That's only a little thing, but that's the kind of guys I had.
